Translations.Text: qala l-mala-u alladhina is'takbaru min qawmihi lanukh'rijannaka yashuʿaybu wa-alladhina amanu maʿaka min qaryatina aw lataʿudunna fi millatina qala awalaw kunna karihina

qadi if'tarayna ʿala l-lahi kadhiban in ʿud'na fi millatikum baʿda idh najjana l-lahu min'ha wama yakunu lana an naʿuda fiha illa an yashaa l-lahu rabbuna wasiʿa rabbuna kulla shayin ʿil'man ʿala l-lahi tawakkalna rabbana if'tah baynana wabayna qawmina bil-haqi wa-anta khayru l-fatihina
waqala l-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi la-ini ittabaʿtum shuʿayban innakum idhan lakhasiruna
fa-akhadhathumu l-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
alladhina kadhabu shuʿayban ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha alladhina kadhabu shuʿayban kanu humu l-khasirina
fatawalla ʿanhum waqala yaqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risalati rabbi wanasahtu lakum fakayfa asa ʿala qawmin kafirina
wama arsalna fi qaryatin min nabiyyin illa akhadhna ahlaha bil-basai wal-darai laʿallahum yaddarraʿuna
thumma baddalna makana l-sayi-ati l-hasanata hatta ʿafaw waqalu qad massa abaana l-darau wal-sarau fa-akhadhnahum baghtatan wahum la yashʿuruna
walaw anna ahla l-qura amanu wa-ittaqaw lafatahna ʿalayhim barakatin mina l-samai wal-ardi walakin kadhabu fa-akhadhnahum bima kanu yaksibuna
afa-amina ahlu l-qura an yatiyahum basuna bayatan wahum naimuna
awa-amina ahlu l-qura an yatiyahum basuna duhan wahum yalʿabuna
afa-aminu makra l-lahi fala yamanu makra l-lahi illa l-qawmu l-khasiruna
awalam yahdi lilladhina yarithuna l-arda min baʿdi ahliha an law nashau asabnahum bidhunubihim wanatbaʿu ʿala qulubihim fahum la yasmaʿuna
til'ka l-qura naqussu ʿalayka min anbaiha walaqad jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kanu liyu'minu bima kadhabu min qablu kadhalika yatbaʿu l-lahu ʿala qulubi l-kafirina
wama wajadna li-aktharihim min ʿahdin wa-in wajadna aktharahum lafasiqina
thumma baʿathna min baʿdihim musa biayatina ila fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi fazalamu biha fa-unzur kayfa kana ʿaqibatu l-muf'sidina
waqala musa yafir'ʿawnu inni rasulun min rabbi l-ʿalamina
haqiqun ʿala an la aqula ʿala l-lahi illa l-haqa qad ji'tukum bibayyinatin min rabbikum fa-arsil maʿiya bani is'raila
qala in kunta ji'ta biayatin fati biha in kunta mina l-sadiqina
fa-alqa ʿasahu fa-idha hiya thuʿ'banun mubinun
wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idha hiya baydau lilnnazirina
qala l-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hadha lasahirun ʿalimun
yuridu an yukh'rijakum min ardikum famadha tamuruna
qalu arjih wa-akhahu wa-arsil fi l-madaini hashirina
yatuka bikulli sahirin ʿalimin
wajaa l-saharatu fir'ʿawna qalu inna lana la-ajran in kunna nahnu l-ghalibina
qala naʿam wa-innakum lamina l-muqarabina
qalu yamusa imma an tul'qiya wa-imma an nakuna nahnu l-mul'qina
qala alqu falamma alqaw saharu aʿyuna l-nasi wa-is'tarhabuhum wajau bisih'rin ʿazimin
